name: The Synergist
goal: We are an incubator of various projects and help with implementation of strategy, communication, and fundraising. To achieve our goals, we actively seek funding and support from a variety of partners and sponsors (representing industry, academic and nonprofit sectors) who have a common interest in the specific issues our projects tackle.
interests: Climate Action, Education, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health
euInitiatives:
EP Declarations, Resolutions and other initiatives on the topic of maternal health, gender equality, work-life balance, minorities and mobility within the Europe. Examples include:
1. Parental Leave Directive
2. Declaration 0015 on universal access to maternal healthcare
3. European Commission Public Consultation on possible action addressing the challenges of work-life balance faced by working parents and caregivers
4. European Commission Public Consultation on Expert Panel on effective ways of investing in Health (EXPH) - Preliminary opinion on ‘Access to health services in the EU’’
The following EP Committees: ENVI, DROI, FEMM, DEVE, EMPL
5. IMI
